import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Topic, Webinar } from '../home/home.model'; import { HomeService } from '../home/home.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-browse-by-topics', templateUrl: './browse-by-topics.component.html', styleUrls: ['./browse-by-topics.component.scss'] }) export class BrowseByTopicsComponent { topicList:Array = []; specialityList:Array = []; webinarData:Array = []; constructor(private readonly homeService:HomeService) { this.topicList = this.homeService.getTopicList(); this.specialityList =this.homeService.getSpecialityList(); this.webinarData = this.homeService.getWebinarByTopic(); } }
